CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: On the other hand , we noted that benzodiathiazole (BT)-or benzoxadiazole (BO)based conjugated polymers are one of the most important organic semiconductors due to their easy preparation , excellent stability , and optoelectronic characteristics , and many efforts have been devoted to the design and synthesis of new BT / BO derivatives.

Let's think step by step.

1. Benzodiathiazole (BT)
2. Benzoxadiazole (BO)
3. Conjugated polymers (implied to be BT or BO-based)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Benzodiathiazole (BT)
2. Benzoxadiazole (BO)
3. BT-based conjugated polymers
4. BO-based conjugated polymers

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Benzodiathiazole (BT) |
| Benzoxadiazole (BO) |
| BT-based conjugated polymers |
| BO-based conjugated polymers |
